DOC.brief_summary: To compare nitroglycerin terbutaline intrapartum fetal heart rate resuscitation
DOC.brief_title: Nitroglycerin Versus Terbutaline Intrapartum Fetal Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: : nonreassuring fetal heart rate trace maternal cardiac disease , placental abruption , intrauterine growth restriction , prior cesarean section
